=== Notes ===

==== 3D ====
For direct rendering the "nvidia-glx"-module is required. Install with "sudo apt-get install nvidia-glx

==== Beryl ====
See https://help.ubuntu.com/community/BerylOnEdgy

==== Wireless ====
With Edgy this is a big issue (https://launchpad.net/ubuntu/+source/linux-source-2.6.17/+bug/63418) The wireless sometimes disappear after sleep. Just put it to sleep again and it will probably return. 

==== Webcam ====
Download and install the r5u870-module, http://lsb.blogdns.net/ry5u870/ . You need build-essentials for this.
